Package it.polimi.ingsw.utilities.parsers

Enum Class ObjectsToJson

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<ObjectsToJson>
it.polimi.ingsw.utilities.parsers.ObjectsToJson
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ObjectsToJson>, Constable
public enum ObjectsToJson extends Enum<ObjectsToJson>
Converts some game objects to json format.
Author:
Riccardo Motta
